home.welcomeDescription: Your gateway to the XRP Ledger. Connect your wallet to get started.
home.trustSetDescription: Set up trust lines for tokens

wallet.connectDescription: Select a wallet to connect to Ripplet
wallet.connectDescriptionPrompt: Connect your wallet to start signing XRPL transactions
wallet.notInstalledDescription: Please install the wallet extension to continue.
wallet.noAddressReceivedDescription: Please make sure you have created or imported a wallet account in {{wallet}} before connecting.
wallet.installPrompt: Please install the wallet extension and refresh the page.
wallet.connectionRejectedDescription: You rejected the connection request. Please try again and approve the connection.
wallet.comingSoonDescription: Support for this wallet is coming soon. Stay tuned!

transaction.pendingDescription: Please wait while your transaction is being processed.
transaction.successDescription: Your transaction has been confirmed on the ledger.
transaction.failedDescription: Your transaction could not be completed.

payment.title: Payment
payment.subtitle: Send XRP to another account
payment.connectWalletDescription: Please connect your wallet to send payments
payment.destinationTagHint: A 32-bit unsigned integer to identify the reason for the payment
payment.destinationTagInvalid: Destination tag must be between 0 and 4294967295

ioudPayment.title: IOU Payment
ioudPayment.subtitle: Send IOU tokens to another account
ioudPayment.issuerHint: The account that issues this token
ioudPayment.destinationTagHint: A 32-bit unsigned integer to identify the recipient
ioudPayment.destinationTagInvalid: Destination tag must be between 0 and 4294967295

ioudEscrowCreate.title: Create IOU Escrow
ioudEscrowCreate.subtitle: Lock IOU tokens in an escrow
ioudEscrowCreate.destinationTagHint: A 32-bit unsigned integer to identify the recipient
ioudEscrowCreate.destinationTagInvalid: Destination tag must be between 0 and 4294967295
ioudEscrowCreate.issuerHint: The account that issues this token
ioudEscrowCreate.finishAfterHint: The ledger index after which the escrow can be finished
ioudEscrowCreate.finishAfterInvalid: FinishAfter must be less than CancelAfter
ioudEscrowCreate.cancelAfterHint: The ledger index after which the escrow can be cancelled
ioudEscrowCreate.conditionHint: Optional: A hex-encoded crypto-condition that must be met to finish
ioudEscrowCreate.ledgerIndexInvalid: Ledger index must be a valid positive integer

ioudEscrowFinish.title: Finish IOU Escrow
ioudEscrowFinish.subtitle: Release IOU tokens from escrow
ioudEscrowFinish.ownerHint: The account that created the escrow
ioudEscrowFinish.offerSequenceInvalid: Offer sequence must be a non-negative integer
ioudEscrowFinish.offerSequenceHint: The sequence number of the escrow creation transaction
ioudEscrowFinish.conditionHint: The condition from the original escrow (if applicable)
ioudEscrowFinish.fulfillmentHint: The hex-encoded fulfillment that satisfies the condition

mptTransfer.title: MPT Transfer
mptTransfer.subtitle: Send MPT tokens to another account
mptTransfer.mptIssuanceIdInvalid: MPT Issuance ID must be a 48-character hexadecimal string
mptTransfer.destinationTagInvalid: Destination tag must be between 0 and 4294967295

mptLock.title: MPT Lock/Freeze
mptLock.subtitle: Lock or unlock MPT tokens for a holder
mptLock.mptIssuanceIdInvalid: MPT Issuance ID must be a 48-character hexadecimal string

mptClawback.title: MPT Clawback
mptClawback.subtitle: Clawback MPT tokens from a holder
mptClawback.mptIssuanceIdInvalid: MPT Issuance ID must be a 48-character hexadecimal string
mptClawback.warning1: Clawback requires the MPT issuance to have clawback enabled
mptClawback.warning2: Tokens will be returned to the issuer

offerCreate.title: Create Offer
offerCreate.subtitle: Create a new offer on the XRPL DEX
offerCreate.currencyHint: Use "XRP" for XRP, or 3-letter currency code for IOU
offerCreate.expirationHint: Ledger index after which the offer expires
offerCreate.offerSequenceHint: Sequence number of an existing offer to replace
offerCreate.issuerRequired: Issuer is required for non-XRP currency
offerCreate.expirationInvalid: Expiration must be a positive number
offerCreate.offerSequenceInvalid: Offer sequence must be a non-negative integer

offerCancel.title: Cancel Offer
offerCancel.subtitle: Cancel an existing offer on the XRPL DEX
offerCancel.offerSequenceHint: The sequence number of the OfferCreate transaction that created the offer you want to cancel
offerCancel.offerSequenceHelp: You can find the sequence number in your account's offer list or transaction history
offerCancel.offerSequenceInvalid: Offer sequence must be a non-negative integer

credentialCreate.title: Create Credential
credentialCreate.subtitle: Issue a credential for an account
credentialCreate.subject: Subject Address
credentialCreate.subjectHint: The account that will receive this credential
credentialCreate.subjectHelp: The XRPL account address that will receive this credential
credentialCreate.credentialTypeHint: A type identifier for the credential (e.g., KYC, ID Verification)
credentialCreate.credentialTypeHelp: Will be automatically hex-encoded for the transaction
credentialCreate.expirationHint: Ripple epoch time (seconds since 2000-01-01). Leave empty for no expiration.
credentialCreate.subjectSameAsAccount: Subject cannot be the same as your account
credentialCreate.expirationInvalid: Expiration must be a positive number

credentialAccept.title: Accept Credential
credentialAccept.subtitle: Accept a credential issued to you
credentialAccept.issuerHint: The account that created the credential you want to accept
credentialAccept.issuerHelp: The XRPL account address that issued the credential
credentialAccept.credentialTypeHint: The type of credential to accept (must match the issued credential)
credentialAccept.credentialTypeHelp: Must match the credential type that was issued to you
credentialAccept.issuerSameAsAccount: Issuer cannot be the same as your account

credentialDelete.title: Delete Credential
credentialDelete.subtitle: Remove a credential from the ledger
credentialDelete.deleteAsIssuerHelp: You created this credential and want to delete it
credentialDelete.deleteAsSubjectHelp: You received this credential and want to delete it
credentialDelete.targetAddressHintIssuer: The account that received the credential
credentialDelete.targetAddressHintSubject: The account that issued the credential
credentialDelete.credentialTypeHint: The type of credential to delete
credentialDelete.credentialTypeHelp: The type of the credential you want to delete
credentialDelete.targetAddressSameAsAccount: Target address cannot be the same as your account

trustset.title: Trust Set
trustset.subtitle: Create or modify trust lines for issued currencies
trustset.currencyInvalid: Must be a 3-letter ISO code or 40-character hex string
trustset.issuerHint: The account that issues this currency
trustset.limitInvalid: Limit must be a valid number >= 0
trustset.limitZeroInfo: Setting limit to 0 will delete the trust line (if balance is also 0)

accountset.title: Account Settings
accountset.subtitle: Configure your XRPL account settings and flags
accountset.domainHint: Optional domain name for your account (will be hex encoded)

flags.defaultRippleTooltip: Enable rippling on trust lines by default. This allows your issued currencies to be automatically rippled through connected trust lines.
flags.requireAuthTooltip: Require authorization for others to hold your issued currencies (IOUs). Other accounts must be pre-approved to hold your tokens.
flags.disallowXRPTooltip: Disallow incoming XRP payments from strangers. Only accounts you've authorized can send you XRP.
flags.requireDestTagTooltip: Require a destination tag on all incoming payments. Useful for exchanges and hosted wallets to identify recipients.

accountdelete.title: Delete Account
accountdelete.warning1: Your account will be permanently deleted
accountdelete.warning2: All remaining XRP will be transferred to the destination
accountdelete.warning3: Account must have no trust lines or objects
accountdelete.destinationHint: Account to receive your remaining XRP balance
accountdelete.destinationTagHint: A 32-bit unsigned integer to identify the reason for the transfer
accountdelete.destinationTagInvalid: Destination tag must be between 0 and 4294967295
accountdelete.confirmLabel: I understand this will permanently delete my account
accountdelete.confirmHint: Please confirm you understand the risks
accountdelete.subtitle: Delete your XRPL account and transfer remaining XRP

escrow.title: Escrow
escrow.destinationTagHint: A 32-bit unsigned integer to identify the reason for the escrow
escrow.destinationTagInvalid: Destination tag must be between 0 and 4294967295
escrow.finishAfterHint: The ledger index after which the escrow can be finished
escrow.finishAfterInvalid: FinishAfter must be less than CancelAfter
escrow.cancelAfterHint: The ledger index after which the escrow can be cancelled
escrow.conditionHint: Optional: A hex-encoded crypto-condition that must be met to finish
escrow.conditionFinishHint: The condition from the original escrow (if applicable)
escrow.fulfillmentHint: The hex-encoded fulfillment that satisfies the condition
escrow.ownerHint: The account that created the escrow
escrow.offerSequenceInvalid: Offer sequence must be a non-negative integer
escrow.offerSequenceHint: The sequence number of the escrow creation transaction
escrow.cancelSubtitle: Cancel an escrow and reclaim funds

mpt.amountPrecisionHint: MPT precision depends on the Asset Scale set at issuance (0-19 decimal places). Enter the amount according to the actual precision of this MPT.

create.title: Create MPT
create.subtitle: Issue a new MPToken issuance
create.assetScaleHint: Number of decimal places for the token (0-19). For example, scale 6 means amounts are in millionths.
create.assetScaleInvalid: Asset scale must be between 0 and 19
create.maximumAmountHint: Maximum number of tokens that can be issued. Leave empty for unlimited supply.
create.maximumAmountHelp: Enter as integer (e.g., 1000000 for 1 million tokens)
create.flagTransferableHint: Allow holders to transfer the token to each other
create.flagRequireAuthHint: Holders must get explicit approval from the issuer before they can hold this token
create.flagCanLockHint: Allow issuer to freeze/unfreeze individual holder balances
create.flagCanClawbackHint: Allow issuer to claw back tokens from holders
create.flagCanTradeHint: Allow trading in the decentralized exchange (not currently implemented)
create.transferFeeHint: Fee charged on transfers between holders. 100 = 0.01%, 5000 = 0.5%, max 500000 = 50%
create.transferFeeInvalid: Transfer fee must be between 0 and 500000
create.metadataHelp: Optional JSON metadata following XLS-89 schema

set.title: Modify MPT
set.subtitle: Update MPT issuance flags
set.mptIssuanceIdHint: The 48-character hexadecimal ID of the MPT issuance to modify.
set.mptIssuanceIdInvalid: MPT Issuance ID must be a 48-character hexadecimal string
set.flagsNote: Note: Only certain flags can be changed after creation. You can only enable flags, not disable them.
set.flagEnableLockHint: Allow issuer to freeze/unfreeze individual holder balances
set.flagEnableClawbackHint: Allow issuer to claw back tokens from holders

destroy.title: Destroy MPT
destroy.subtitle: Permanently remove an MPT issuance
destroy.mptIssuanceIdHint: The 48-character hexadecimal ID of the MPT issuance to destroy.
destroy.mptIssuanceIdInvalid: MPT Issuance ID must be a 48-character hexadecimal string
destroy.warningDesc: Destroying an MPT issuance is permanent. This can only be done when no tokens are held by any accounts (all tokens have been burned).

authorize.title: Authorize MPT
authorize.subtitle: Authorize holders or opt-in to hold an MPT
authorize.mptIssuanceIdHint: The 48-character hexadecimal ID of the MPT issuance.
authorize.mptIssuanceIdTooltip: The 48-character hexadecimal ID of the MPT issuance.
authorize.mptIssuanceIdInvalid: MPT Issuance ID must be a 48-character hexadecimal string
authorize.holderHint: For Issuers: Enter the holder address to authorize/unauthorize a specific account. For Holders: Leave empty to opt-in to holding this MPT.
authorize.holderHelp: Leave empty if you are a holder opting in to hold this MPT
authorize.revokeAuthHint: Enable this to remove authorization from the holder instead of granting it.

escrowCreate.title: Create MPT Escrow
escrowCreate.subtitle: Lock MPT tokens in an escrow
escrowCreate.destinationTagHint: A 32-bit unsigned integer to identify the recipient
escrowCreate.destinationTagInvalid: Destination tag must be between 0 and 4294967295
escrowCreate.mptIssuanceIdInvalid: MPT Issuance ID must be a 48-character hexadecimal string
escrowCreate.finishAfterHint: The ledger index after which the escrow can be finished
escrowCreate.finishAfterInvalid: FinishAfter must be less than CancelAfter
escrowCreate.cancelAfterHint: The ledger index after which the escrow can be cancelled
escrowCreate.conditionHint: Optional: A hex-encoded crypto-condition that must be met to finish
escrowCreate.ledgerIndexInvalid: Ledger index must be a valid positive integer

escrowCancel.title: Cancel MPT Escrow
escrowCancel.subtitle: Cancel an MPT escrow and return funds

nftMint.title: Mint NFT
nftMint.subtitle: Create a new non-fungible token
nftMint.nftokenTaxonHint: A taxon (category) for this NFT. Can be any integer. Use 0 if not categorizing.
nftMint.uriHelp: URL or data pointing to NFT metadata. Will be hex-encoded.
nftMint.transferFeeHint: Percentage fee for secondary sales (0-50000 = 0%-50%). Only applies if transferable.
nftMint.issuerHelp: Another account that can issue NFTs on behalf of this minter
nftMint.flagBurnableHint: Allow the issuer to burn this NFT
nftMint.flagOnlyXrpHint: Only XRP can be used for buying/selling this NFT
nftMint.flagTrustLineHint: Create a trust line to hold this NFT
nftMint.flagTransferableHint: Allow this NFT to be transferred (recommended)

nftBurn.title: Burn NFT
nftBurn.subtitle: Permanently destroy an NFT
nftBurn.nftokenIdHint: The unique identifier of the NFT to burn
nftBurn.nftokenIdHelp: The 64-character hex identifier of the NFT
nftBurn.ownerHint: Only needed if burning an NFT owned by another account (requires burnable flag)

nftCreateOffer.title: Create NFT Offer
nftCreateOffer.subtitle: Create a buy or sell offer for an NFT
nftCreateOffer.offerTypeHint: Sell Offer: You're selling your NFT. Buy Offer: You're offering to buy someone else's NFT.
nftCreateOffer.nftokenIdHint: The unique identifier of the NFT
nftCreateOffer.issuerRequired: Issuer is required for non-XRP currency
nftCreateOffer.ownerHint: The owner of the NFT you want to buy
nftCreateOffer.ownerRequired: Owner is required for buy offers
nftCreateOffer.destinationHint: Restrict this offer to a specific buyer/seller
nftCreateOffer.expirationHint: Ledger index after which the offer expires
nftCreateOffer.expirationInvalid: Expiration must be a positive number

nftAcceptOffer.title: Accept NFT Offer
nftAcceptOffer.subtitle: Accept a buy or sell offer for an NFT
nftAcceptOffer.nftokenSellOfferHint: The NFTokenID of a sell offer to accept. Use this if you're buying the NFT.
nftAcceptOffer.nftokenBuyOfferHint: The NFTokenID of a buy offer to accept. Use this if you're selling your NFT.
nftAcceptOffer.offerRequired: Either sell offer or buy offer is required
nftAcceptOffer.brokerFeeTitle: Broker Fee (Optional) - Only for brokered transactions
nftAcceptOffer.brokerFeeInvalid: Broker fee must be greater than 0
nftAcceptOffer.brokerFeeIssuerRequired: Issuer is required for non-XRP currency

nftCancelOffer.title: Cancel NFT Offer
nftCancelOffer.subtitle: Cancel an NFT offer you created
nftCancelOffer.nftOffersHint: The unique identifiers of the NFT buy or sell offers to cancel
nftCancelOffer.nftOffersRequired: At least one NFT offer ID is required
nftCancelOffer.hint: Enter the offer IDs you want to cancel. You can cancel multiple offers in a single transaction.

iouEscrowCancel.title: Cancel Escrow
iouEscrowCancel.subtitle: Cancel an IOU escrow and return funds
iouEscrowCancel.ownerHint: The account that created the escrow
iouEscrowCancel.offerSequenceInvalid: Offer sequence must be a non-negative integer
iouEscrowCancel.offerSequenceHint: The sequence number of the escrow creation transaction

overviewPage.title: SC+ Credential Implementation Schemes
overviewPage.subtitle: Four technical approaches for supply chain finance on XRPL

mptScheme.title: MPT (Multi-Purpose Token) Scheme
mptScheme.subtitle: Ripple's RWA strategic direction with native metadata
mptScheme.features: Native metadata, fine-grained permissions, Clawback capability

iouScheme.title: IOU (Trustline Token) Scheme
iouScheme.subtitle: Fast and flexible, leveraging mature ecosystem

nftScheme.title: NFT (Non-Fungible Token) Scheme
nftScheme.subtitle: Perfect fit for one-invoice-one-credential model
nftScheme.features: Built-in marketplace, unique token per invoice

credentialsScheme.title: Credentials Scheme
credentialsScheme.subtitle: Maximum compliance as non-token attestation
credentialsScheme.transferNoteDesc: Since credentials cannot be transferred directly, you must first delete the old credential and then re-issue a new one to the recipient.

wizard.refreshWarning: Refreshing the page will reset your progress

walletConnect.connectedDescription: Your wallet is connected to XRPL
